title: 2nd floor 1 bedroom, 1 bath (2815 W 25th Pl
posting_body: Beautiful 1 bedroom/ 1 bath apartment available in Little Village.
This apartment is located on 25th & California, a couple blocks to downtown 26 street.
This is a 2nd floor apartment out of a 2 story building and it has GREAT sunlight.
This is a professionally managed building, with maintenance and construction on payroll.
We do not subcontract our work to 3rd party providers.
- Bedroom easily fits a Full sized bed.
- In front of the CTA on California
If you are looking to live in the heart of Little Village, steps from all of what 26th Street has to offer.
This is the location for you.
Mexican restaurants that are nearby: Lalo's Mexican Restaurant, Taqueria El Milagro, Taqueria Los Comales and Mi Tierra.
Maybe you want to experience pizza, Little Village is home to the first Home Run Inn Pizzeria.
Not to mention bakeries, pushcart vendors, and ethnic grocery stores.
If you like to jog, there is a park only a quarter of a mile away.
A small walk to the Little Village Strip Center.
Tenants are responsible for gas and electric.
Tenants must get renters insurance throughout the whole term of the lease.
There is an application fee per person for a background and credit check.
If approved, we would move forward with one month's security deposit and the first month's rent when you move in.
If you have any questions please contact me.
